primary.context: Caller received a letter about the new portal but is having trouble with the registration ID and login process
primary.detail: The agent verified the caller and was in the process of confirming the email address to send a registration link when the call ended.

steps: Caller explained difficulty registering for the new Vacatia Clubhouse portal.
Agent performed account lookup using phone number.
Agent verified identity using name spelling and state of residence.
Agent clarified the difference between RCI ID and Vacatia ID.
Agent offered to send a new registration link.
Agent confirmed the email address on file.
Call ended before the agent could confirm the link was sent.

clarifications.note: Agent asked to confirm last name spelling
Agent asked for spelling a second time

corrections.note: User corrected agent's spelling of last name

actions.detail: Verified name and state of residence

insights.summary: The caller was struggling to register for the new Vacatia Clubhouse portal and was confused about which ID to use. The agent successfully verified the account and was about to send a registration link when the call disconnected.
insights.verbatim: I type in the code that I got from the code, and it says it's not no good. Actually, it logged me in. It says we're already we're already members. I'm just trying to set this thing up. It's ridiculous.
